charges.charge_disposition: Deft was found guilty on Counts 1 and 2 of a two count indictment; deft shall pay a special assessment of $100.00 for counts 1 and 2 ($50.00 each count), payable to Clerk, USDC for deposit into the Crime Victims Fund; Imprisonment 18 months in each of counts 1 and 2 to run concurrently with each other; Supervised Release of 2 years in each of counts 1 and 2 to run concurrently with each other, with standard and additional conditions; Fine of $2,000.00 ($1,000.00 for each count); (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:666(d)(1) and 18:666(a)(1)(B) Bribery concerning programs receiving Federal funds. (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft was found guilty on Counts 1 and 2 of a two count indictment; deft shall pay a special assessment of $100.00 for counts 1 and 2 ($50.00 each count), payable to Clerk, USDC for deposit into the Crime Victims Fund; Imprisonment 18 months in each of counts 1 and 2 to run concurrently with each other; Supervised Release of 2 years in each of counts 1 and 2 to run concurrently with each other, with standard and additional conditions; Fine of $2,000.00 ($1,000.00 for each count); (2)
